name.en: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.jp: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.thai: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.ko: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.zh_tw: 那天,我们与少女相遇了
name.zh_cn_jp: 那天,我们与少女相遇了
name.zh_cn_tw: 那天,我们与少女相遇了
name.zh_cn_cn: 那天,我们与少女相遇了

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.thai: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.ko: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井为了阻止遊戲開發部被废社，于是便把愛麗絲带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.thai: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.ko: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_tw: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.ko: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。
desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer. Then, Momoi noticed something.
desc.jp: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer. Then, Momoi noticed something.
desc.thai: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer. Then, Momoi noticed something.
desc.ko: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer. Then, Momoi noticed something.
desc.zh_tw: 三人相继掉了下去，还好老师在底下做了些许缓冲。这时，桃井发现了什么东西。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人相继掉了下去，还好老师在底下做了些许缓冲。这时，桃井发现了什么东西。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人相继掉了下去，还好老师在底下做了些许缓冲。这时，桃发现了什么东西。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.thai: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.ko: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的愛麗絲，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。綠可怜愛麗絲，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，愛麗絲因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千禧年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.jp: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.thai: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.ko: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井将愛麗絲带回到社团活动室，綠非常惊诧。愛麗絲因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让愛麗絲伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千禧年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.thai: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.ko: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_tw: 事情告一段落。莉音消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，遊戲開發部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千禧年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事情告一段落。莉音消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.en: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.jp: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.thai: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.ko: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵向老师表示，埃里都已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠向老师表示，埃里都已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵向老师表示，埃里都已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠向老师表示，埃里都已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。

hobby.jp: 今日の運勢の確認、オカルト全般
hobby.zh_tw: 確認今天的運勢、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.jp: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.thai: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.ko: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音在此事后决定卸任会长一职，優香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。

desc.en: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.jp: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.thai: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.ko: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.zh_tw: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长寧瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长尼禄康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长宁瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长妮露康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。

desc.en: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.

desc.ko: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.zh_tw: 工程師部一如既往的开发着新东西。貝里塔斯和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。真理社和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。

hobby.jp: トレーニング、ガーデニング

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.thai: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.ko: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.zh_tw: 老师被叫到了遊戲開發部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。愛麗絲邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.jp: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]

desc.zh_tw: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】
desc.zh_cn_jp: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】
desc.zh_cn_tw: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】
desc.zh_cn_cn: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.thai: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.ko: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。
desc.zh_tw: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
